title: President uses the media to set policy agenda

content.question: In trying to influence legislation, the President is generally more successful than congressional leaders in

choices.label: using the legislative schedule to political advantage
satisfying interest group demands for access to the policy process
effectively using formal parliamentary powers rather than persuasion
using the media to set the policy agenda

content.answer: using the media to set the policy agenda

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Compare political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
